wikipedia_page.main: Sir William Mortimer Clark (also spelled Clarke), KC (May 24, 1836 – August 10, 1915) was a Canadian lawyer and politician.

link_mentions.page: List of lieutenant governors of Ontario

response: *Lieutenant Governor of Ontario – William Mortimer Clark
*Lieutenant Governor of Ontario – William Mortimer Clark
*Lieutenant Governor of Ontario – William Mortimer Clark
*Lieutenant Governor of Ontario – Oliver Mowat (until April 19) then William Mortimer Clark (from April 21)
*August 10 – William Mortimer Clark, lawyer, politician and Lieutenant Governor of Ontario (b. 1836)
*Lieutenant Governor of Ontario – William Mortimer Clark (until September 22) then John Morison Gibson
*Lieutenant Governor of Ontario – William Mortimer Clark
*May 24 – William Mortimer Clark, lawyer, politician and Lieutenant Governor of Ontario (died 1915)
